com.bnd.core.consoleclient

Class ConsoleClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bnd.core.consoleclient.ConsoleClient

  • public abstract class ConsoleClient
extends Object
    ConsoleClient is the abstract superclass of all command line clients. It's a single entry point to the application.
    Since:
    2011
    Author:
    Â© Peter Banda
